name: Casa Del Gremlin
description:
The Vinesauce Charity event is July 21st to 23rd. Money raised goes to the Pediatric Cancer Research Foundation.

NOTE:If music doesn't play, try refreshing the page.

A super short game for the Rev Game Jam. Charge through a gremlin fortress as fast as you can, fighting everything in your way.

Controls:
A/D/Left/Right - Move
W/Space/Up - Jump
S/Down - Drop from platform
Left Mouse- Swing Sword

After defeating the boss your score (determined by how fast you beat the game) will be displayed, as well as a bonus if your final total of lives outnumbers your deaths.

Creative Commons credits for sound effects listed in-game.
